document.full_text: britain's martin laird overcame a dreadful start and his own demons to capture the arnold palmer invitational on sunday by one stroke over american steve marino.
document.title: laird overcomes shaky start to win at bay hill
lines_and_colors: britain's martin laird overcame a dreadful start and his own demons to capture the arnold palmer invitational on sunday by one stroke over american steve marino.
